: BrightBlade listened to all the noises which came from outside, every 
creek, every voice�and even the sound of the brigs door locking�and coming 
to a seal.
So, they meant to capture her within this petty room now? HA! She would love 
to see them try!
Now she was wiser, and now she was more determined then ever to get out, and 
get her revenge!
BrightBlade pressed her finger to the small cloaking device as she heard the 
fire systems activate, they weren�t going to get her with the same trick 
twice!!
Now, the cloaking shield around her had a more�reflective surface to it, 
mainly so that whatever was behind and around her would look just that. So 
there was no mistake that the sprinkler drops would be viewed as if they 
were going through her as well.
Besides, she was armed, and although she may not kill Rex�she wasn�t about 
to hesitate shooting him!
The door to the CR chamber opened, light spilling on onto her optics.
BrightBlade smiled but made no sound, simply walking towards the opening, 
her weapon trained at Rex�s head should he discover her ploy and try 
anything.
No the real test of her abilities began. :
